ðŸ“– Summary: TidyAI is a PowerShell-based Windows tool that leverages ChatGPT to intelligently organize files within messy folders. It integrates directly into the Windows Explorer context menu, allowing users to right-click a folder and initiate the AI-powered organization process. The tool is designed to be safe, only moving files into appropriate folders and providing an undo system for easy reversion.
